name: Viper-M3-3.2
summary: A love triangle develops between Kenji and the two women he's grown to love. Will he choose his childhood friend and cosplay-fanatic, Kaoru, or the beautiful and charming, Rika? And whomever he chooses, will the other be jealous?
info:

  • 游戏类型: ADV
  • 发行日期: 2002-12-20

  • 原画: 小娘
  • アニメーション: 小娘
